## Source: amazon-inspector (7f5afbcc650f7845d47544c5033aba92c5a2ab80d2e0d27e99437ef31cc6c249)
The package api-umbrella-admin-ui was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a999c959e7bdf0843867f7df8e0f0413096bbec70b570ef3bf46dd4b226e8aaf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'api-umbrella-admin-ui' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
